plot: John's wife leaves him, and he is forced to sell his flat. As a result, he must confront his darkest secret. The thing he has hidden... in The Loft.
title: The Loft
plot_es: John's wife leaves him, and he is forced to sell his flat. As a result, he must confront his darkest secret. The thing he has hidden... in The Loft.
plot_en: John's wife leaves him, and he is forced to sell his flat. As a result, he must confront his darkest secret. The thing he has hidden... in The Loft.
